meanings.sent1: The old chair was painted blue.
meanings.sent2: The painted walls brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The painted fence looked like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as painted as a clown's.
meanings.sent5: The painted sky at sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The painted landscape captured the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent2: The painted portrait of the queen was displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The painted scene seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent4: His words painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The painted flowers in the artwork were so realistic.

meanings.definition: Having a bright or vivid color.
meanings.sent1: The bird had painted feathers that shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden were painted in various hues.
meanings.sent3: The painted dress stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter painted the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The painted sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and pink.
